snippet.title: The Kindeman Remedy - Exclusive Official Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description: Watch the sinister trailer for the upcoming sim-management horror game, The Kindeman Remedy. Become a monster as you conduct horrifying experiments on prisoners in order to restore your reputation. Manage your resources, continue your experiments, and don't get caught. The Kindeman Remedy is coming soon, and you can check out the game’s demo on Steam now.
